Thus have I heard:
Once, the Buddha was in the Jeta Grove of AnÄthapiá¹‡á¸ada's Park in the city of ÅšrÄvastÄ«, together with a great assembly of 1,250 bhiká¹£us.
At that time, the World-Honored One was surrounded by the fourfold assembly, as well as devas, nÄgas, yaká¹£as, gandharvas, asuras, garuá¸as, kiá¹ƒnaras, mahoragas, humans, non-humans, and others.
At that time, the World-Honored One said to the great assembly:
You should listen attentively!
I will tell you the names of the buddhas of the past, future, and present.

If good men and good women receive and uphold, read and recite the names of the buddhas, in this present life they will be at ease, far removed from difficulties, and will eliminate all their past offenses. In the future, they will attain supreme, perfect enlightenment.
If good men and good women wish to eliminate all offenses, they should bathe and put on new clean clothes, kneel for a long time with palms joined, and say:

Good men and good women who uphold, recite, and chant the names of these buddhas will be at peace in this life, will be free from all difficulties, and will eliminate all their past offenses. In the future, they will definitely attain supreme, perfect enlightenment.

Homage to Buddha of the Forest of Merits Homage to the Buddha of the Dharma Realm, the King of Good Emancipation, who is unobstructed, adorned with the light of countless suns and moons, the crest adorned with a net of the most exquisite fragrance of the body of an elephant, the eyes of the light of the jewel of lapis lazuli, the banner of the light of the merit of purity, the victory over dust and defilements in the space, who is now expounding the Dharma in the world of light.
In that buddha-realm, there was a bodhisattva named Incomparable.

That buddha bestowed a prediction that before long he would attain supreme perfect enlightenment, and would be called the Buddha of the Banner of the Light of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Light of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of the Eyes of
